name: TENUOUS:City
description:
==========================

TENUOUS:City

==========================

TENUOUS:City is an interactive music album using samples from and inspired by the PS1 game GERMS: Nerawareta Machi

Buy the TENUOUS:City album here

ControlsKeyboardControllerMoveWASDFace Button (Y,A) / L1 R1
LookArrow KeyLeft StickInteractSpaceFace Button (B)
